p:
EV-A71 is an RNA virus that belongs to the human enterovirus A (EV-A) species, genus Enterovirus , family Picornaviridae
1 . Viral particles have an icosahedral shape, are not enveloped and contain a single-strand, positive-sense RNA genome. The most common method for enterovirus genotyping targets the 1D gene encoding the VP1 capsid protein containing the major neutralizing epitopes
4 . Human-infecting enteroviruses species include enterovirus A (EV-A), EV-B, EV-C, and EV-D. The classification of human enteroviruses is based on each strainâ€™s homology within the RNA region coding for the VP1 capsid protein
1 .
